name: AHG Actor Browse
description: High-performance actor browse and autocomplete using Laravel Query Builder and direct ES queries. Replaces base AtoM actor browse that causes N+1 query hangs.
author: The Archive and Heritage Group
features: Actor browse via direct ES HTTP queries (no Elastica)
Batch facet population (2 queries instead of N+1)
Actor autocomplete via ES prefix search with DB fallback
